content: पृष्ठतस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Behind, behind the back, from behind, गच्छतः पृष्ठतोऽन्वियात् <ls>Ms. 4. 154</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 300</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 40.</ls> {@--2@} Towards the back, backwards; गच्छ पृष्ठतः. {@--3@} On the back. {@--4@} Behind the back, secretly, covertly. (पृष्ठतः कृ means {1} to place on the back, leave behind. {2} to neglect, forsake, abandon. {3} to renounce, desist from, leave off, resign; येनाशाः पृष्ठतः कृत्वा नैराश्यमवलंबितं <ls>H. 1. 144</ls>; लज्जां पृष्ठतः कृत्वा <ls>K.</ls>; पृष्ठतो गम् to follow; पृष्ठतो भू {1} to stand at the back. {2} to be disregarded).
